color.type: default / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger

:description.description: A description for the field. Provides a hint such as specific requirements for what to choose.
:description.description_zh: 字段的说明。提供提示，例如选择内容的具体要求。

isRequired.description: Whether user checkboxes are required on the input before form submission.
isRequired.description_zh: 在提交表单之前，输入是否需要用户复选框。

isReadOnly.description: Whether the checkboxes can be selected but not changed by the user.
isReadOnly.description_zh: 复选框是否可以被选中，但不能由用户更改。

isInvalid.description: Whether the radio is invalid. This is based on the radio group `validationState` prop.
isInvalid.description_zh: 对讲机是否无效。这是基于radio group 'validationState' prop。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the animation should be disabled.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the radio slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为无线电插槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: Radio root wrapper, it wraps all elements.
slots.description_zh: 无线电根包装器，它包装所有元素。

slots.name: wrapper
slots.description: Radio wrapper, it wraps the control element.
slots.description_zh: 无线电包装器，它包装控制元件。

slots.name: control
slots.description: Control element, it is the circle element.
slots.description_zh: 控制元素，它是圆形元素。
